bike.description: All new 06 M5 S-Works hardtail, M5-XX alloy with ORE DT & TT, fully manipulated TT, DT, SS, CS, forged and relieved HT and BB shell, Asymmetric Mono-stay seatstays, disc mount, cold forged dropouts, replaceable derailleur hanger, 2 water bottle mounts

components.description: Fox F90X, Inertia-valve damping with threshold (sensitivity) and rebound adjustment, 90mm travel, alloy steerer, air spring
1 1/8" threadless, intergrated 10mm insertion alloy cups, sealed cartridge bearing

Specialized XC Carbon flat, 31.8mm OS bar, 5 degree backsweep, 580mm width
Specialized MTB grip, black/charcoal
